column1:
"Customer: Hi, this is Nadia Karim. I’d like to cancel order H100200 for TV-4420 before it ships.
Agent: Hello Ms. Karim. I will check the status now.
Agent: The order has not shipped. I can cancel it right away.
Customer: Please cancel it.
Agent: Done. You will receive a cancellation email and refund confirmation shortly."

"Customer: Hello, I’m Ben Turner. I received CAM-1200 but the color is wrong. Order J220310.
Agent: I’m sorry, Mr. Turner. We can exchange it at no cost.
Customer: How do I start the exchange?
Agent: I will email a prepaid label. Ship it back and we’ll send the correct color once scanned in."

"Customer: Hi, this is Elena Petrova. I want price match for TAB-880. Order K330415.
Agent: Hello Ms. Petrova. We offer price match within seven days.
Customer: I found a lower price at a local store.
Agent: Please send a link or photo. If it qualifies, we will refund the difference today."
"Customer: Hello, I’m Jorge Alvarez. I need a VAT invoice for PHN-551. Order L440522.\nAgent: Of course, Mr. Alvarez. I will generate a VAT invoice with your business details today."

"Customer: Hi, this is Aisha Khan. DRN-300 is missing an extra propeller. Order M550603.
Agent: I’m sorry about that, Ms. Khan. I will ship the propeller set today at no cost.
Customer: Do I need to return anything?
Agent: No return needed. I also extended your return window by seven days."

"Customer: Hello, I’m Marco Rossi. I want to schedule installation for AVR-700. Order N660744.
Agent: We can schedule Friday morning at 10 a.m. Does that work?
Customer: Yes, thank you.
Agent: Done. You will receive confirmation and technician details."

"Customer: Hi, this is Mei Lin. I need a student discount for SSD-2TB before I order.
Agent: We offer 10 percent off with a valid student ID.
Customer: What proof do you need?
Agent: Please upload your student ID at checkout. The discount applies instantly."

"Customer: Hello, I’m Pavel Ivanov. My LPT-920 shipment is stuck. Order O770855. No movement for three days.\nAgent: I’m sorry, Mr. Ivanov. I will open a trace with the carrier now and update you within 24 hours."

"Customer: Hi, this is Fatima Zahra. I need to change the delivery address on P880966 for EARB-500.
Agent: Your order has not shipped yet. I can update the address now.
Customer: Please change it to my office address.
Agent: Done. I sent a confirmation email with the new address."

"Customer: Hello, I’m Lucas Martins. My coupon SAVE20 does not work for PROJ-450.
Agent: The code requires a cart total over 200 dollars. The projector qualifies. I applied the discount for you.
Customer: Great, proceed please.
Agent: Done. You will see the updated total in your cart."

"Customer: Hi, this is Sara Ahmed. I want in-store pickup for CONS-PSX instead of delivery. Order Q990107.
Agent: I can switch to store pickup. The City Center branch has stock. I reserved one under your name.
Customer: Thank you.
Agent: You will receive a pickup PIN by SMS."

"Customer: Hello, I’m Tom Williams. I need an international plug for WCH-20 charger.
Agent: The charger supports 100 to 240 volts and includes a US plug. I can add a UK adapter at no cost.
Customer: That’s perfect.
Agent: Added. It will appear in your order confirmation."

"Customer: Hi, this is Noor Hamdan. I want to recycle my old GPS-900 when my new one arrives.\nAgent: We offer free recycling pickup with new deliveries. Hand the old unit to the courier on delivery day."

"Customer: Hello, I’m David Park. I need to split payment for MON-5000 between two cards.\nAgent: We can split payment into two secure links: half and half. Once both are paid, we will process your order."

"Customer: Hi, this is Olivia Gomez. What is the return policy for opened earbuds, lightly used?\nAgent: You can return within 14 days with all accessories. No restocking fee if the item is clean and complete."
